price: Is then He Who creates equal to one who cannot create? Will you not then take heed?
arabic: أَفَمَن يَخۡلُقُ كَمَن لَّا يَخۡلُقُۚ أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
